title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Locate the first Combo.
3. Click on the first Combo.
4. Observe the focus behavior.
